introduction: 一个全男性寄养家庭试图一起享受最后一个早晨，否则他们的团结就会被不可避免的事情打破。FESTIVALS & AWARDSGolden Calf Competition (Best Short Film, shortlisted), Netherlands Film Festival, 2021In Competition (Golden Lion), Best Dutch Short Film, Cinekid Festival (NL), 2021Special Jury Mention, Niederrhein Film Festival (DE), 2022In Competition, Cinema Jove - Festival Internacional de Cine de Valencia (ES), 2022In Competition (for the “Heart-on Award”), Busan International Kids & Youth Film Festival (KR), 2022In International Competition, Drama International Short Film Festival (GR), 2022In Competition, Motovun Film Festival (HR), 2022In Competition, Mezipatra Queer Film Festival (CZ), 2022In Competition, Desperado LGBTQ+ Film Festival (US), 2022Special Showcase, New Filmmakers L.A. (US), 2022In Selection, OutFest L.A. (US), 2022In Selection, FIRE!!
